metadata.title: Blue skies over Mastodon
metadata.description: Erin Kissane: During the big waves of Twitter-to-Mastodon migrations, tons of people joined little local servers with no defederation policy and were instantly overwhelmed with gore and identity-based hate. A lot of those people, understandably, did not stick around, and plenty of them went back toâ€¦
metadata.author: mattl
